org.xlattice.corexml.bind

Class NameGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.corexml.bind.NameGenerator

  • public class NameGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generate standard method names from the base field name.

    • Method Detail

      • dehyphenate

        public static java.lang.String dehyphenate(java.lang.String s)
        If there are any letter-HYPHEN-letter sequences in a name, replace them with letter-LETTER. That is, the hyphen is removed and the following letter converted to upper case.

      • insertAllNames

        static void insertAllNames(java.lang.String lcName)
        Given a well-formed identifier that is NOT present in the various name tables, populate them. XXX Although it is not enforced here, a well-formed identifier has an alphabetic first character and zero or more additional alphanumeric characters, where this is understood to include the underscore character '_'. XXX LATER NOTE: we must allow tags containing hyphens and have systematic rules for generating field names from them.
        Parameters:
        lcName - base form of key with first letter lower case

      • getterName

        public static java.lang.String getterName(java.lang.String base)
        Returns:
        the name of the getter, "get" + ucFirst singular

      • isName

        public static java.lang.String isName(java.lang.String base)
        Returns:
        the name of the boolean getter, "is" + ucFirst singular

      • setterName

        public static java.lang.String setterName(java.lang.String base)
        Returns:
        the name of the setter, "set" + ucFirst singular field name

      • adderName

      • sizerName

        public static java.lang.String sizerName(java.lang.String base)

      • varName

        public static java.lang.String varName(java.lang.String base)

      • collName

        public static java.lang.String collName(java.lang.String base)
        Returns:
        the name of a collection, so the lower-case plural
